website_summaries.verdict: Attractive and comfortable  water resistant women's BareTrap boots. Designed for use in snow and ice.
pros: Seamless mix of leather and textile as well as convenient criss-cross lacing
Fur lining extends through the whole boot for consistent warmth
Rubber sole with honeycomb pattern for improved grip in icy conditions
cons: Toe box is a bit tight

customer_reviews.title: Very cute boot
customer_reviews.text: This boot is just as pictured and the color is just as it looks. They fit great and look good on, however, they do make my feet look big so haven't decided yet whether I'll keep them. Obviously I can't say if they'll keep my feet warm as there isn't any snow yet, but they are fur lined and they are BareTraps after all, so they most likely are very warm!
customer_reviews.author: Kibbles

customer_reviews.title: Cute boots
customer_reviews.text: Very cute boots. They are warm and comfortable. I have worn them 30° weather and a small amount of snow and my feet were warm and dry. However, the small amount of snow that had been on the toe of the boot changed the fabric slightly and the color ( on the black). Would recommend a water repellant spray.
customer_reviews.author: JESSIE

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Comfy. Sizing seemed accurate. I ordered my usual size.. And I have somewhat wide feet. Perfect for larger, muscular calves too.
customer_reviews.author: UnknownEntity

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable,  well made
customer_reviews.text: Warm, comfortable, waterproof. I love them as I live in a rainy area and work outside.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Big calves? These are for you!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size 10 without realizing they had 9.5 available-i normally wear a size 9. Surprisingly they fit . I have space for thick socks. I havent wore them as i bought them for an upcoming trip. Walked around the house. Comfortable! Also a plus, i have very big legs - calves. They closed and not forced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the best boots ever
customer_reviews.text: great easy boots. they are worn in and out very easily and their inside feels comfortable and warm. I regret why I bought others before this one.totally, Baretraps is a very good brand of shoes and boots. I recommend Baretraps.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Warm & Toasty Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. Comfortable right out of the box. No breaking in required and very warm. Bought these in my normal size of 7.5.
customer_reviews.author: Raven4u5

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect winter boots for a cold weather. Warm, comfortable and cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Been searching for my BareTraps for a few years
customer_reviews.text: Love my BareTraps! They are so warm and cozy. I just wish that this style came in all waterproof suede. My last pair, which were shorter on my ankle like a bootie, were very similar in style but all suede (purchased from QVC). The fit is perfect - 8.5M.
customer_reviews.author: Dezi115

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as others have stated but warm
customer_reviews.text: These aren’t comfortable for walking all day in NYC. After reading the reviews, I jumped at purchasing these but had to experience on my own....thank goodness I brought sneakers to change into at the end of the day. They are warm although we didn’t experience any snow or wet weather while there.
customer_reviews.author: csweet311

customer_reviews.title: Second pair I bought and I love them, really comfortable for walking all day long ...
customer_reviews.text: Second pair I bought and I love them, really comfortable for walking all day long and really warm even with light socks.
customer_reviews.author: RosaE

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!!
customer_reviews.text: Very warm. I used them in winter in Switzerland and felt warm all the time. Bought black and tan color.
customer_reviews.author: Susy Chacón

customer_reviews.title: very narrow
customer_reviews.text: These boots were very cute however they were very narrow i normally take a M width which is what it says these boots are but they are very narrow to be a regular width
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Got so many compliments and kept my feet very dry and warm.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Very warm good tred easy to get on and off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Warm
customer_reviews.text: These boots are very warm and good walking in the snow but do run a tad large.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: They look good, are comfortable, fit properly and quite affordable.
customer_reviews.author: marsha

customer_reviews.title: Cute and look good
customer_reviews.text: My sister came into town and I fell in love with them. I'm so happy Amazon carried them. I recommended them to a woman at the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NICE BUT RUN SMALL
customer_reviews.text: I WEAR 71/2 OR 8 HAD TO GET 81/2 AND IT'S TIGHT.
customer_reviews.author: M. BANKS

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. Think they run a little small soni bought a bigger size. Theyre attractive, warm, and have a nice sole.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Love the style
customer_reviews.text: Great item for the price. I ordered a 1/2 size bigger and the fit is good. I love the look and feel of the boot!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife. Fits great. Looks great. She gets a lot of compliments
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these boots and has been wearing them every day!
customer_reviews.author: S.W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots for the Snow!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great! We got a snow storm the other day and I was able to use them. My feet stayed warm and drys while shoveling and they were high enough to keep the snow out. They are tight but I think it’s because they are new. Great boots!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Toasty Toasty Toasty Warm!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots even though they didn’t fit as expected. They are very, very warm! I hate to have cold feet! It’s one of my worst pet peeves! But I wore these with thin socks because they were a bit narrow and my feet were so toasty in below freezing NYC weather!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Lu

product_meta.title: BareTraps Womens Aero Suede Ankle Winter Boots
product_meta.description: These Womens Baretraps Aero Winter Boots are guaranteed authentic. They’re crafted with Leather/Man Made/Faux Fur, and the closure is .
feature_bullets: The heel height is 1 1/2 inches and the color is Whiskey.
